$BTC transaction fees have averaged $432,633 over the past month. They have averaged $314 for $BCH and $125 for $BSV  That means it would take 3.8 years for Bitcoin Cash & 9.5 years for Bitcoin SV to accrue the same amount of transaction fees to miners as Bitcoin does in one day.
